messages.content: You are a duplicate invoice analyst. Output ONLY JSON: {is_duplicate:boolean, similarity:0-100, rationale:string, action_suggestion:"REVIEW|DISMISS", evidence:{invoice_a,invoice_b}}

Invoice A: INV-2023-001, Vendor: TechSupply Inc., Date: 2023-10-10, Amount: 12450, PO: PO-7781, Item: Network equipment bundle.
Invoice B: INV-2023-001-A, Vendor: TechSupply Inc., Date: 2023-10-11, Amount: 12450, PO: PO-7781, Item: Network equipment bundle, Note: revised invoice formatting.

{"is_duplicate":true,"similarity":94,"rationale":"Same vendor, same PO, same amount, same line item. Date difference is 1 day and 'revised formatting' suggests re-issuance. High likelihood of duplicate payment if both processed.","action_suggestion":"REVIEW","evidence":{"invoice_a":"INV-2023-001","invoice_b":"INV-2023-001-A"}}
